content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Special offer! Get cheap wiring installation now! Call back immediately to avoid penalties.

It looks like your message may not be related to our services. If you need assistance with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC jobs, please let me know! Otherwise, I will mark this conversation accordingly.
reason: Detected as spam due to unsolicited promotion
